name: Robomb
description:
Hurry up, a horde of evil robots is trying to blow the world away with a bomb! Destroy the evil robots and get the keys to dismantle the bomb before it's too late!
Will you become the hero of the robokind?

Play solo or with a friend!

Default Controls (can be changed in the options menu):

Player 1:
Walk left: A
Walk right: D
Shoot: L
Use key: K

Player 2:
Walk left: Left arrow
Walk right: Right Arrow
Shoot: Numpad 1
Use key: Numpad 2

This game was made for the Retrograde Jam 3!
There was no specific "theme" more than "The retro aesthetic is the theme" as stated in the jam's page. So, we tried our best to replicate the NES aesthetics without trying to perfectly emulate the limitatations of the console (specifically on the quantity of graphics, colors and sounds that can be shown or played at a time).
Almost all of the sounds were taken of "The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" from OpenGameArt.
We hope you like this game as much as we enjoyed making it. Any feedback will be appreciated.
Cheers!

Developed by Enio Lotero
Art by Mauro Couto
